intro.rsvp: Let us know if you're coming! RSVP
details.body_1: The party kicks off on Saturday noon and will go on until Sunday, the actual birthday.
details.body_2: If youâ€™d like to stay overnight, thereâ€™s a 20-bed dormitory upstairs â€” just let me know in advance!
details.body_3: As mentioned, weâ€™ll have a BBQ, so feel free to bring your favorite grillables.
details.body_4: Drinks will be available, but youâ€™re also welcome to bring your own.
details.body_5: Fingers crossed for good weather! If the sun is on our side, weâ€™ll enjoy some outdoor games.
details.body_6: Weâ€™ll have a shared Spotify playlist, so everyone can contribute to the music.
details.body_7: Costumes are optional but highly recommended! Get creative and have fun with it.
details.body_8: Cats are welcome, but dogs must stay homeâ€”sorry, doggos!
location.title: Etzel
location.body_1: You might know where Etzel is... but here the precise address of the hÃ¼tte:
location.body_4: - Take the train to Einsideln, then a bus to Egg SZ and it's a 10-minute walk from there.
location.body_5: - By bike, well, you know the way: Etzel, Sattelegg, Raten... but don't forget the way back.
location.body_6: - Parking for just a couple of cars is available next the HÃ¼tte, I would keep them for those carrying babies. On the Etzelpass and also in Egg there is more parking available
location.body_7: - And if not snowshoeing, hiking. Take the train to PfÃ¤ffikon SZ, and hike over the Etzelpass
rsvp.body: Let us know who's coming and if you're staying overnight!
